All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AffectedArea
Represents an affected area with its geographical coordinates, danger radius levels, and notification message.
AffectedAreaController
Controller class for handling requests related to affected areas.
AffectedAreaMapper
Mapper interface for converting between AffectedArea entity and DTOs.
AffectedAreaRepo
Repository class for accessing affected area data from the database.
AffectedAreaRequest
Represents a request to create or update an affected area with its geographical coordinates, danger radius levels, and notification message.
AffectedAreaResponse
Represents a dto response for an affected area with its geographical coordinates, danger radius and notification message.
AffectedAreaService
Service class for handling operations related to affected areas.
AuthController
Controller class for handling authentication requests.
AuthResponse
This class represents the response sent to the client after a successful authentication.
AuthResponseMessage
Enum representing various authentication response messages.
EmailService
Service class for sending emails.
EmailTemplateService
Service class for generating email templates.
EmailTemplateType
Enum representing different types of email templates.
EnumValidator
Custom validator for validating that a string value is a valid enum constant.
ErrorResponse
This class represents an error response that is sent back to the client when an error occurs in the application.
GetPointsOfInterestRequest
Request class for getting points of interest.
HouseholdRepository
This class is responsible for interacting with the database to perform CRUD operations related to households.
JwtAuthorizationFilter
The JWT filter for authenticating a JWT authenticated request.
JwtMissingPropertyException
Exception class for when a JWT is missing a property.
JwtUtils
Utils class for JWT based tasks.
KrisefikserApplication
Main application class for the Krisefikser application.
LoginRequest
This class represents the request sent to the server when a user attempts to log in.
PasswordUtil
Utility class for password hashing and verification.
PointOfInterest
This class represents a point of interest (POI) with its attributes.
PointOfInterestController
Controller class for handling requests related to points of interest.
PointOfInterestRepo
This class is a repository for managing points of interest in the database.
PointOfInterestRequest
This class represents a response object for a point of interest (POI).
PointOfInterestResponse
This class represents a response object for a point of interest (POI).
PointOfInterestService
Service class for managing points of interest.
PointOfInterestType
Enum representing different types of points of interest.
RegisterRequest
This class represents the request sent to the server when a user attempts to register.
Role
Enum representing the different user roles in the system.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for setting up authentication and authorization configurations.
User
Model class representing a user in the system.
UserMapper
Mapper interface for converting between RegisterRequest and User objects.
UserRepository
Repository class for managing user data in the database.
UserService
Service class for handling user-related operations.
ValidationUtils
Utility class for handling validation errors.
ValidEnum
Custom annotation for validating that a string value is a valid enum constant.
